When I am disabling menu bar, it's replaced with the "Firefox", placed on the tab bar. And I can't move it on other bar (for example, navigation bar).
So, when I unchecking "Always display tab bar" and only one tab is opened, I can't access Firefox menu.

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: gagarin.gtn@gmail.com
